author: Erin Doherty
title: Russian forces bomb a mosque in Mariupol as attacks continue in Kyiv
description: Russian ground forces have also edged to within 25 kilometers of Kyiv's city center.
content:
Russian forces shelled a mosque in the port city of Mariupol on Saturday that was sheltering more than 80 people, including children, the Ukrainian government said, AP reports.
